subject: Attention
body:
Attention
Attention
 
This is to notify you that your funds valued Seven Million Five
Hundred Thousand united states dollars (U.S. $7,500,000.00) has been released today to the UBA BANK.
 
For your convenience, You will have to start transferring your fund within 24hrs online by yourself to your local account. By Online Banking with this method you will monitor the movement of the local funds online till your account is duly credited.
 
So Contact the UBA BANK to receive the login details of your Online account so you can commence the transfer by yourself.
 
CONTACT PERSON:
MR. JAMES CLINTON
UBA BANK CORPORATION
EMAIL: 
customercare@unibafri.com

subject: Re: Attention
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. Could you please provide more details about how I can contact UBA BANK to receive the login details for my online account?

Best wishes,
Elizabeth

subject: Re: From United Bank for Africa
body:
Welcome to United Bank for Africa Lagos.
United Bank for Africa
Address: Head Office: 57 Marina, Lagos Island, Lagos
Foreign Reserve Escrow Account Officer
Tel/Whats-app: +(234)901-619-3435

I am glad to announce to you today that a new payment policy has been 
adopted and you have been shortlisted for payment via Online Banking 
United Bank for Africa, We hereby inform you that United Bank for Africa 
Marina, Lagos Island, have instructed to open online account on your 
behalf to credit your account with the approved amount of 
US$7,500,000.00 Million United States Dollars only deposited from World 
Bank Group of Berlin In Europe as instructed by United Nation 
organization, Further more Endeavor to email us the following 
information for immediate processing.

Full Names:
Address:
State of Origin:
Nationality:
Social Security Number:
Marital Status:
Birthday:
Residential Address:
Office Address:
Age:
Country:
Phone no:
ID:

These are the requirements that you need to be aware of before you 
contact us. You will fill the online account opening information's, in 
regards to your funds $7.5 Million that has been approved by the Federal 
Government of Germany also Federal Government of United State and United 
Nation Organization. Note that you pay $150 for crediting and processing 
fee.

Thank you
Regards,
Mr. James Clinton
Foreign Reserve Escrow Account Officer
United Bank for Africa

subject: Re: From United Bank for Africa
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I'm interested to learn more about the new payment policy and how it works. Could you please explain how the online banking system at United Bank for Africa functions? Additionally, what are the steps involved in opening an online account to receive the approved amount of US Million Dollars from the World Bank Group?

Best wishes,
Elizabeth

subject: Re: From United Bank for Africa
body:
As it stated in my previous email, the Online Banking process will Open 
with your full details information along with your ID card, they the 
login details will send to which you will use to access your account 
privately, you will be at liberty to make transfer of your choice any 
day anytime you want both international and local transfer, but before 
we start the process you have to confirm your full details information 
along with the required fee.

Thank you
